title: How to Create Random Text in Microsoft Word

steps.title: Open Word.
steps.content: Open Word. If you cannot find the Microsoft® Word program, try searching in your start menu for it. Be sure to open a document or create a new one once Word is open.

steps.title: Type =rand(number of paragraphs,number of sentences per paragraph).
steps.content: Type =rand( number of paragraphs , number of sentences per paragraph ) . Be sure to fill in " number of paragraphs " and " number of sentences per paragraph " with the values you prefer (e.g., =rand(2,3) gives two paragraphs of random text, each having three sentences).

steps.title: Hit ↵ Enter.
steps.content: Hit ↵ Enter . This will now generate the specified number of sentences and paragraphs filled with random text.

steps.title: Type =lorem(number of paragraphs,number of sentences per paragraph).
steps.content: Type =lorem( number of paragraphs , number of sentences per paragraph ) . Be sure to fill in " number of paragraphs " and " number of sentences per paragraph " with the values you prefer (e.g., =lorem(2,3) gives two paragraphs of lorem ipsum text, each having three sentences).

steps.title: Hit ↵ Enter.
steps.content: Hit ↵ Enter . This will now produce the needed number of sentences and paragraphs of lorem ipsum text.
